summary: COS believes Jamaican government wants not be overtly involved in Cold War. Any attempt to involve Jamaican government against its will at this time would result in net loss of cooperation now and in future. Station regards increasing cooperation of RUABBE service in Cuban objectives of considerable value. COS believes it advantageous to KUBARK and ODYOKE for AMBUD stay out of Jamaica until sentiment changes.
title: GYROSE AMBUD
